summary: Noldorian Nightshade provides a new HD retexture of Calyps\' sexy and very popular Nightshade armour with lore-friendly materials like fur and chainmail which fits into the style and colour scheme of my popular Noldorian series.
descriptionHtml:
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/GqgDpUll.jpg[/IMG]

About the Mod

Noldorian Nightshade provides a new HD retexture of Calyps\' sexy and very popular Nightshade armour with lore-friendly materials like fur and chainmail which fits into the style and colour scheme of my popular Noldorian series.

After the totally lore friendly [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30501]Noldorian Lifeguard Cuirass[/url] I wanted to do something different and here we go with this sexy piece of armour, which does not offer much protection, but makes your female character a real eye candy.

I have re-textured the cuirass, boots and bracers, to get a full set. I have not touched the leggins though since my friend NanaBeats is working on chainmail leggins in her fantastic mod  [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27787]Nightshade Retexture UNPB[/url].

About the looks of it images can say more than thousand words of mine - especially since I had the honour to be able to get some of the greatest screenarchers on the Nexus as beta testers for my work. Be sure to check out their remarkable work in the gallery on this front page and in the image section of this mod.


Requirements

Skyrim 1.8 is required for this mod to work. Furthermore you will need Calyps\' [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12070]Nightshade Armour[/url], preferably the UNPB version, but UNP should work too.


Installation

1. Download and activate Calyps\' [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12070]Nightshade Armour[/url].

2. Download the mod file and extract the file into your skyrim directory, e.g. C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\Data and say \"yes\" when being asked to integrate and override.


Un-installation

Please refer to the un-installation note on Calyps\' mod page.

Credits go to...

- Calyps for his friendly permission of this retexture and the original mod
- NanaBeats for some of the base textures - check out her fantastic work
- Bethesda for creating the gaming masterpiece Skyrim
- Professor Tolkien who made a fact-loving lawyer and historician believe in magic again, the  day I discovered his unique and ever outstanding work back in 2001
- Peter Jackson and WETA Workshop for being a great inspiration for this mod
- Lana del Rey, Howard Shore, Harry Gregson-Williams, Richard Wagner, Giacomo Puccini and others for helping me through endless hours of modding work

and last but absolutely not least to my fantastic group of beta testers :

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/705688]Seren4xx[/url]

The gallery on this front page is a tribute to YOU and your contribution, your friendly help and encouragement and as well to your inspiring and outstanding screenarchery work. THANK YOU SO MUCH!


Permissions

You are not allowed to use any assets of this mod whithout my permission.

Gallery

Now, after so much reading you really deserve the visual joyride provided by my wonderful Beta testers. Be sure to check out their other work here on the Nexus ( links to their work can be found in the \"Credits\" section. Enjoy it!

Author\'s note :

If you like this mod please take a second to show your apprechiation, leave a comment or load up a picture - I\'d be really grateful for it, since I have put many hours of work and a lot of determination into it. If you face any issues please let me know, so that we may find a solution together.
author: EcthelionOtW
